attributes.action: allow personal and defined contribution private pension funds to invest up to £20,000 in Premium Bonds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Premium bonds offer a guaranteed return of capital to the investor and the chance of tax free cash prizes. The money invested also benefits the UK Government - an obvious boon in the current climate. Suggestion is to allow transfer of Pension Pot funds to Premium bonds up to the normal limit of £20,000. Individual's pension fund would be the bond holder and any prizes to be paid directly in the fund and kept therein until retirement.
